message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $10,000. I believe it offers excellent value at this price point. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $10,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $7,500 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I'm eager to make a deal, $7,500 is below its true value.  Could you meet me halfway at $9,000?
I understand your concerns, but $9,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $8,500. Can you consider my offer?
